text:
So it used to be that when you clicked the "portfolio" tab on a mutual fund page, the resulting page displayed some useful valuation information, such as the average P/E and P/S of the fund's portfolio. But that information now seems to be missing.

Does anyone know where this went? Am I missing it? If not, why did M* remove this information? I personally thought it was quite helpful to know these statistics, to get a quick idea of just how low/high the valuations were of the stocks in the portfolio.

If this information is really gone for good from M*, does anyone know where I can find such portfolio valuation metrics elsewhere?
